str2: Of Hebrew origin; Zacharias, the name of two Israelites.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To disturb, agitate, stir up, trouble. Of uncertain affinity; to stir or agitate.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To fall upon, press upon, light upon, come over. From epi and pipto; to embrace or seize.
(a) fear, terror, alarm, (b) the object or cause of fear, (c) reverence, respect. From a primary phebomai; alarm or fright.
